about.title: Building the future of AI, one solution at a time
about.description: We're a boutique AI studio that combines deep technical expertise with practical business acumen to deliver AI solutions that actually work in production.
about.story_description: Founded in 2025, we have always believed that AI is a powerful tool that can be used to solve pain points across various domains and create new opportunities. We started with a simple vision: to make AI accessible and practical for everyone.
about.founded_description: Started with a vision to make AI accessible and practical for everyone.
about.products_description: Developed diverse AI applications and services.
about.applications_description: We develop innovative applications and provide specialized services that solve real-world problems using AI technology.
about.achievements_description: Recognition from industry leaders and successful partnerships confirm our expertise and commitment to excellence.
about.testimonials_description: Real feedback from organizations we've partnered with to deliver AI solutions that drive measurable results.
about.trust_description: We prioritize transparency and trustworthiness in every project.
about.impact_description: We believe AI should solve real-world problems and create meaningful value.
about.collaboration_description: We work alongside your team, not just for you, ensuring knowledge transfer and sustainable success.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize AI adoption by providing enterprise-grade solutions that are practical, scalable, and deliver measurable business value. We bridge the gap between cutting-edge AI research and real-world implementation.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading boutique AI studio in Southeast Asia, known for our technical excellence, practical approach, and ability to deliver AI solutions that transform businesses and create lasting competitive advantages.

phitiai.name: Phitiai
phitiai.heroSubtitle: Bridging the gap between centuries-old traditions and modern technology. A consolidated platform for planning Thai ceremonies with clarity and ease.
phitiai.problemDesc: Thai ceremonies require attention to detail, but younger generation lacks time and knowledge of ritual details.
phitiai.solutionDesc: AI that understands Thai culture helps create blessing cards, plan merit ceremonies, and calculate auspicious times in seconds.
phitiai.feature1_desc: Powered by RAG and Vector Search to provide culturally accurate recommendations
phitiai.feature2_desc: Plan merit ceremonies and calculate auspicious times with AI
phitiai.feature3_desc: Buy and sell Prompts and Digital Assets for traditional ceremonies

marketplace.title: Multi-Sided Marketplace Ecosystem
marketplace.description: A complete ecosystem connecting users, vendors, and service providers in one seamless platform.

techStack.title: Built with Modern Tech
techStack.description: Our robust architecture ensures scalability, reliability, and exceptional user experience.

phitiai.ctaTitle: Need a complex platform built with modern standards?

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Phitiai platform.
faq.a1: Simply select a festival, enter recipient's name, and wait for AI to create card in seconds.
faq.a2: Supports all Thai festivals including Songkran, Loy Krathong, New Year, and general merit ceremonies.
faq.a3: Our AI is trained on thousands of Thai ceremony data, achieving 90%+ accuracy in auspicious timing and ritual recommendations.
faq.a4: Yes! You can choose from pre-designed templates or create custom cards with AI assistance.

pluktunraka.name: ปลูกทันราคา
pluktunraka.heroTitle: Plant Based on Price - Plan Backwards with AI
pluktunraka.heroSubtitle: Predict crop prices 3-6 months ahead, get crop recommendations, and analyze market trends to maximize your profit.
pluktunraka.feature1_desc: Predict crop prices 3-6 months in advance
pluktunraka.feature2_desc: Recommend crops suitable for soil and season
pluktunraka.green: Good time to plant - prices expected to rise
pluktunraka.red: Not recommended - prices expected to fall
pluktunraka.successTitle: Khon Kaen farmer reduced fertilizer costs by 30%
pluktunraka.successDesc: Using our AI-powered recommendations, farmers can optimize planting schedules and reduce costs significantly.
pluktunraka.ctaDesc: Start using AI for your farm today

faq.q1: What is accuracy of price predictions?
faq.a1: Average accuracy 85-90%, depending on crop type and available data.
faq.a2: Supports major Thai economic crops including rice, corn, cassava, and garden vegetables.

smartfarm.name: SmartFarm
smartfarm.heroTitle: Bring Cloud AI Power to Your Farm Edge
smartfarm.heroSubtitle: Real-time monitoring with Edge Computing, Always-On connectivity, and WeighVision™ for enterprise-scale farming.
smartfarm.feature1_desc: Works even without internet using Edge AI
smartfarm.feature4_desc: Scalable from small farms to large enterprises

stats.title: Why Choose SmartFarm?
stats.subtitle: Built for reliability and performance in any environment

weighVision.title: WeighVision™ Technology
weighVision.description: Revolutionary AI-powered weighing system that transforms how you measure and assess produce quality in real-time.
weighVision.feature1_desc: Accurate weight measurements with AI-powered quality assessment
weighVision.feature2_desc: AI analyzes produce quality, size, and grade automatically
weighVision.feature3_desc: Track yield trends and optimize production with data-driven insights

offlineFirst.title: Offline-First Architecture
offlineFirst.description: Our system works even without internet connection, ensuring your farm never stops monitoring.
offlineFirst.feature1_desc: AI runs locally on edge devices for real-time decisions
offlineFirst.feature2_desc: Data syncs to cloud when connection is restored
offlineFirst.feature3_desc: Store up to 30 days of data locally without internet
offlineFirst.feature4_desc: Multiple connectivity options including 4G/5G and LoRaWAN

smartfarm.starterDesc: 1 sensor node, Basic dashboard, Mobile app
smartfarm.farmDesc: 5 sensor nodes, Advanced analytics, Alert system

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SmartFarm platform.
faq.a1: Yes, Edge Computing allows operation without internet, and syncs data when connection is available.
faq.a2: Supports temperature, humidity, light intensity, soil pH, and gas sensors.
faq.a3: WeighVision™ achieves 99.5% accuracy in weight measurement and quality assessment using advanced AI models.
faq.q4: Can I integrate with existing farm systems?
faq.a4: Yes, we provide API integration with popular farm management systems and custom integrations are available.

faq.a2: Supports OpenAI GPT-4, Anthropic Claude, and Local LLMs via Ollama or vLLM.

chartsentinel.feature3_desc: Combine Real-Time Signals and Lab Quality in one platform

chartsentinel.pilotDesc: 1 production line, Basic analytics, Email support
chartsentinel.productionDesc: 5 production lines, Advanced analytics, Priority support
chartsentinel.enterpriseDesc: Unlimited lines, Custom integrations, On-premise deployment

faq.q1: How does ChartSentinel help reduce errors?
faq.a1: AI system detects anomalies in real-time, alerting before problems occur, reducing errors by up to 40%.
faq.a2: Supports common MES systems via API and allows custom integration.

vetpath.name: VetPath AI
vetpath.heroSubtitle: Digital pathology platform with AI diagnosis, cloud-based slide management, and collaboration features for veterinarians.
vetpath.feature1_desc: Diagnose diseases with high accuracy AI
vetpath.feature3_desc: Share and consult with other veterinarians
vetpath.feature4_desc: Support for dogs, cats, and exotic animals
vetpath.enterpriseDesc: Unlimited slides, Custom models, On-premise deployment

faq.q1: What is accuracy of AI Diagnosis?
faq.a1: Average accuracy 92-95%, depending on disease type and slide quality.
faq.a2: Supports SVS, TIFF, NDPI and common Digital Slide formats.
